title: pannaga shayana
sahitya:
pannaga shayana pApa vimOcana khinnatA nAshana kEshi niSUdana


caraNam 1    kanja vilOcana kALiya damana kunjara gamana kOmaLa vadana
    caraNam 2   aNDajavAhana Ashrita pAlana pANDava ranjana pauNraka bhanjana
    caraNam 3    dEvaki nandana daitya niSUdana pAvana caraNa pAlita bhuvana
    caraNam 4    ghOra sacOraka gOpikA nAyaka vArida mEcaka vAraNa pAlaka
    caraNam 5    panca janAntaka pAda samsEvaka vanci bhUpAlaka vAncita dAyaka
